256":"0x006dd67219697fe68d7fbfdea512e7c4cb64a43565ed86171d67e844982da6fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2455248c8ddd9cc6a7af76a13973cddf222072427e7b0e2a7d1aff345145e931","dweb:/ipfs/QmfYjnjRbWqYpuxurqveE6HtzsY1Xx323J428AKQgtBJZm"]}},"version":1}

params.amount: The total amount of `token` to be deposited as a reward over the entire period
params.token: The address of the token to be deposited as a reward
params.weeksCount: The number of weeks, including the current one, over which the rewards will be distributed

depositExactWeek(address,uint256,uint256.details: If a week is separated from previous reward weeks,       or rewards were not claimed in previous weeks in the RewardDistributor contract,      users may need to manually call the `distributePastRewards()` function       to ensure that the rewards are added to the RewardDistributor contract.

params.amount: The amount of `token` to be deposited as a reward
params.token: The address of the token to be deposited as a reward
params.weekTimeStamp: The timestamp of the week for which rewards are being distributed

params.token: - the token address to collect rewards

getTokenWeekAmounts(address,uint256).details: The `pointOfWeek` parameter is any timestamp within the week: wStart[---p-----]wEnd

params.pointOfWeek: The timestamp representing a specific week
params.token: The address of the reward token to be distributed

returns._0: The reward amount for the specified week

params.token: The address of the reward token to be distributed
params.weeksCount: The number of weeks to check rewards for

returns._0: An array containing reward amounts for each week

movePastRewards(address,uint256).details: This function can be called by anyone

params.pastWeekTimestamp: The timestamp representing a point in the past week (must be at least 10 weeks ago)
params.token: The reward token address to be moved

depositEqualWeeksPeriod(address,uint256,.notice: Deposit rewards evenly across a specified period starting from the current week

depositExactWeek(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Deposit rewards into a specific week (starting from current)

distributePastRewards(address).notice: Collects all rewards for 10 past weeks and sends them to RewardDistributor

getTokenWeekAmounts(address,uint256).notice: Returns the reward amount for a specified week (represented by a point within the week)

getUpcomingRewardsForNWeeks(address,uint.notice: Returns rewards for a specified number of weeks starting from the current week

movePastRewards(address,uint256).notice: Manually moves unclaimed past rewards to the next week to enable distribution
